strapiPost.title: Memberships Now Available At Coler Mountain Bike Preserve
strapiPost.content:
You can now become a member at Coler Mountain Bike Preserve (Coler), and your membership dues will go toward the growth of educational programs. 

  • Getting in on it: A year-long membership is $100 (less than $10/mo) and comes with exclusive benefits. Memberships include $25 credit to any 2022 Coler program, 10% off of Coler apparel, entry into a monthly Coler parking drawing, tax benefits, and more. 
  • In nature: Coler is an outdoor destination for people of all ages to use for mountain biking, walking, camping â€” all the outdoor adventuring! Anyone can book events out at Coler as well. 

For more info and to become a member, click HERE.
